message: Let's start with a generous offer, Bob. Accept and we can wrap up the game early!
Middle ground, let's meet in the middle!
A slight adjustment from my previous offer. Still a fair deal, Bob!
You're getting closer, but I'm still hoping for more!
Getting closer to the middle, Bob. Let's meet somewhere in the middle!
I'm not budging, but I'll give you a slightly better deal this time
Getting close to a deal, Bob. Let's try to find a compromise that works for both of us!
I'm not willing to give up much more, but I'm willing to make a final concession
This is my final offer, Bob. Let's split the difference and walk away with a fair deal!
